text: @CNN Amazing....CNN  never noted that the BLM Protests were COVID19 spreaders... must not have seen the 1000s of protestors without masks shoulder to shoulder marching and when not marching congregating to set fires, loot stores, desecrate monuments and pull statues SPREADING VIRUS
